snippet: Jérôme Boateng scored in the 90th minute to give Bayern Munich a 1-0 victory over Manchester City in their Champions League opener in Group E.
abstract: Bayern Munich defeats Manchester City, 1-0, in their Champions League opener; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Jérôme Boateng scored in the 90th minute to give Bayern Munich a 1-0 victory over Manchester City in their Champions League opener in Group E.

headline.main: Bayern Tops Manchester City in Champions League Opener
